description: Vice Admiral Kurlich`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1358 [Grotewohl], http://anidb.net/ch1357 [Wagenseil] and http://anidb.net/ch1359 [Meivoher] fleets.
name: Kurlich
